thread.title: Watch: BTOB Gets Silly And Bicker On MV Set For “Movie”
thread.title_full: Watch: BTOB Gets Silly And Bicker On MV Set For “Movie”

author: christinaoh21
title: Watch: BTOB Gets Silly And Bicker On MV Set For “Movie”
text:
Shares 385   
BTOB recently came back with “Movie” and have released two behind-the-scenes videos of the shoot for the music video of their title track. 
In it, fans can see the members bickering back and forth and their silly antics, regardless of whether or not the camera is rolling. Plus, the videos show fans the members’ unexpected aegyo, questionable English, and their impressive ability to transition from goofy to professional on set. 
Meanwhile, the group topped music charts with their comeback track upon its release and recently made an appearance on “New Yang Nam Show.” 
Watch the two videos below!
